articles.description: Watch BBC Final Score and follow live text coverage of three Premier League games, including Arsenal v Wolves.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up to three games, including Arsenal v Wolves

articles.description: Scotland are drawn in the same group as hosts Germany at Euro 2024 while England are in Group C along with Denmark, Slovenia and Serbia.
articles.title: Scotland in same group as hosts Germany at Euro 2024

articles.description: Arsenal move four points clear at the top of the Premier League table with victory over Wolves at Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Wolves to move four points clear

articles.description: England did just enough to scrape past the Netherlands in a must-win encounter at Wembley Stadium - but Sarina Wiegman's side are still being punished for costly mistakes.
articles.title: 'England get job done but mistakes could prove costly'

articles.description: Kevin Durant's seventh 30-point game in a row lifts him to 10th on the NBA's all-time scoring list.
articles.title: Suns' Durant moves into all-time scoring top 10

articles.description: Bangladesh record a first home Test victory over New Zealand thanks to Taijul Islam's 10-wicket match haul.
articles.title: Taijul claims 10 wickets as Bangladesh make history

articles.description: Ruben Neves says he "wants to stay" at Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal and will not go on loan to Newcastle United.
articles.title: Al-Hilal's Neves says he will not join Newcastle

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan defeats Hossein Vafaei 6-2 to secure his place in the UK Championship final in York for the ninth time.
articles.title: O'Sullivan beats Vafaei to reach ninth UK final

articles.description: Adelaide Strikers beat Brisbane Heat to become back-to-back Women's Big Bash League winners.
articles.title: Strikers beat Heat to win Women's Big Bash League

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag praises Andre Onana's "strong character" following a series of high-profile errors from the keeper.
articles.title: 'He's the second best keeper in the league' - Ten Hag on Onana
